directions: Bring vegetable broth to a boil in a large pot.  Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a small skillet over medium heat.  Saute onions and garlic until translucent.  Stir into pasta and add garbanzo beans, tomatoes, basil, thyme, salt and pepper.  Heat through and serve.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
1 (28 ounce) can whole peeled tomatoes, chopped, juice reserved
title: Garbanzo Tomato Pasta Soup
